short_summary: Remove existing concrete dam and contaminated soil, restore the natural stream, and undertake associated site restoration. Prepare construction documents.
description: Project Description:Remove an existing concrete dam structure and contaminated soil, restore the natural stream and undertake associated site restoration at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, St. John’s Research and Development Centre (RDC). PSPC is seeking proposals from consultants for professional services required to prepare construction documents for this work, which is first steps towards the implementation of a federal policy.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
======================================

### Project Description
------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified consultants for the Flings Brook Dam Decommissioning project at the St. John’s Research and Development Centre (RDC) of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC). The project involves the removal of an existing concrete dam structure and contaminated soil, restoration of the natural stream, and associated site restoration.

### Background Information
------------------------

PSPC is issuing a Request for Proposals (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA) EB129-192368 for Heavy Civil Engineering Services. The invited firms are EastPoint Engineering Ltd, WSP Canada Ltd, and Englobe Corp, which have been qualified in the Municipal discipline for the province of Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Application Instructions
-------------------------

Proposals must be submitted through the SAP Ariba platform by the tender closing date and time indicated in the RFP. Interested firms should review the RFP document carefully to ensure they meet the qualifications and requirements outlined in the document.

### Important Dates
------------------

*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-12T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-29
*   Expected Contract End Date: None

### Contact Information
-------------------

For inquiries or further information, please contact Rachel Miller, Contract Manager, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

---

### Disclaimer
---------------

This tender announcement does not constitute a commitment or an obligation on the part of PSPC, and PSPC reserves the right to cancel the procurement process at any time without prior notice.  PSPC also reserves the right to reject any and all submissions without prior notice.  Bidders are responsible for ensuring that their proposal is submitted on time and in full compliance with the requirements outlined in the RFP document.  PSPC will not be responsible for any delays or losses that may occur due to circumstances beyond its control.
(Ref: [Entente franglaise](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franglais)) 

The tender closure date is today.  The business proposal was not submitted today.  This means that does the business proposal are submitted after 2 pm today.  Therefore, PSPC reserves the right to reject it.  I advise the bidder to only submit business proposal after 2 pm on the closing date. 

###
